casebody.data:
Albert S. DAUGHTRIDGE, Jr. and Mary Margret Holloman Daughtridge
v.
TANAGER LAND, LLC No. 325A18 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 5, 2018 Ronald H. Garber, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Daughtridge, Albert S. (Jr.), et al. Charles S. Rountree, III, Attorney at Law, for Tanager Land, LLC.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the conditional petition filed on the 25th of September 2018 by Plaintiffs in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of December 2018."

Therefore the case is docketed as of the date of this order's certification. Briefs of the respective parties shall be submitted to this Court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 15(g)(2).
